title: The triumphs of love: chastitie: death: translated out of Petrarch by Mris Anna Hume.
author: Petrarca, Francesco, 1304-1374.
publisher: Printed by Evan Tyler, printer to the Kings most excellent Majestie,
notes: With separate dated title pages for "The triumph of chastitie" and "The triumph of death"; pagination and register are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
